title: Past Life Returner - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Mature   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Business Management   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Distrustful Protagonist   Dungeons   Economics   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Money Grubber   Nationalism   Overpowered Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Post-apocalyptic   Previous Life Talent   Reincarnation   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Secretive Protagonist   Time Travel   Weak to Strong

description:
[Would you like to reverse time?]
[All stats will be reset.]
[Please pick a date.]
“February 28th, 1985. The day I was born.”

Wealth, I will seize all the money in the world.

Monopoly, I will seize all the dungeons in the world.

At this time, while the world is still peaceful.

Note: The first 50 chapters will be focused on Stock Market Exchange and other finance stuff. Dungeon and Fantasy related elements only appear later on and even then the business element is still prevalent.>
